I stayed at Novotel Bali Airport for just one night, and it was exactly what I needed ‚Äî convenient, comfortable, and surprisingly stylish. The biggest plus was the location. Being directly connected to the airport made it incredibly easy for a short stay. I didn‚Äôt have to deal with shuttles or taxis ‚Äî just a quick walk from arrivals, and I was checked in and settled. The staff were wonderful ‚Äî super friendly, polite, and helpful from start to finish. Everyone I encountered seemed genuinely eager to make sure guests were comfortable. Check-in was smooth, and I appreciated how welcoming the team was even for a quick overnight stay. The hotel itself has a really nice ambience ‚Äî modern design, clean spaces, and plenty of little photo-worthy spots throughout. I especially enjoyed the fun tech touch of the contactless elevator, where you don‚Äôt press buttons but wave your hand to select your floor ‚Äî a small detail, but one that amused me and felt very on-brand for a modern airport hotel. I also had the breakfast buffet, which was plentiful and fun to explore. There were tons of options ‚Äî most of them new to me, which made it a bit of an adventure. The food presentation was great, and it offered a nice blend of local and international dishes, even if I didn‚Äôt recognize all of them. It‚Äôs definitely one of those breakfasts that‚Äôs worth waking up for, especially if you enjoy trying something different. Between the convenience of being attached to the terminal, the friendly service, and the relaxing atmosphere, Novotel Bali was exactly what I needed for a short layover. It‚Äôs not the kind of place you‚Äôd go for a long resort-style stay, but for ease, comfort, and a touch of luxury before or after a flight, it‚Äôs absolutely perfect.

Food here is good. Rooms are very nice. A bit noisy from room above. Glass toilet doors are probably the main contributor. Overall an easy stay over for early or late flight.

It has been awhile since our last visit. This hotel still has the best feeling of transitioning to another city. The best rate for suite room around at the moment. The buffet breakfast also well managed and well managed. We always come back here again.

Lovely Experience. I always enjoy my stay here. I would highly recommend the Novotel Inbalance spa (situated inside the hotel). After a long flight this was the perfect experience. Brilliant of services, very kind and helpful team, food excellent especially large buffet breakfast and good taste, room..clean, good smell and simple as a center of airport place. Pleasant airport hotel, surprisingly quiet given the proximity to DPS‚Äô runway. Very friendly staff. I enjoyed my In Balance Spa experience with Komang. The 90 min full body massage was excellent. Looking forward to my next visit ü•∞

perfect location for transition! very reasonable price with kind staff!!!

When you book the suite, you got the premier lounge access for afternoon tea. The premier lounge is worth mentioning as you can enjoy plane watching while enjoying some snacks during this afternoon tea time. In addition, they also gave the minibar in the room for free. Thx to Mr Ifan Taufan for welcoming us and helping us with the check in process. The staff are generally very helpful. For parking access, they have premium parking area near the hotel entrance. Service is amazing. We chat with a staff member in the morning, Chandra, who gave us good tips and local Bali attractions. Good selection of local and international cuisine at brekky buffet. That's incredible. The room n facilities have a well condition. For bfast it's really tasty, and also the waitress named Erika give me the best service ever! Hope i can come again to stay at Novotel Airport Bali!
Candri was very great and helpful for advising us of drop at our next stop. Wonderful location near the international airport arrival. Clean and welcoming.

Overall from facilites are good and satisfying. Loved the welcome drink and buffet breakfast so much. This hotel offer various type food, the hospitality was great in many branch and the worker were helpful. It's located only 2 minutes walking distance to international departure.

If you are transiting and need a hotel for the night, this is the place and be sure to look out for Juna behind the bar.

It's useful to know that the hotel is accessible from the airport, which is extremely convenient. Just follow the 'airport hotel' sign and you will get there. You however better to approach it from the inside of the airport, rather than from the street, otherwise you need to climb high stairs and get through people trying to sell their taxi services to you. We have had some difficulties with getting to our next destination, however the reception team tried everything to help us, including phoning the local supplier. We really appreciated it. The breakfast has a good selection of local and continental food, the quality of the service is really high. I can absolutely recommend this hotel.

Wow! The staff were very attentive and the room was beautifully appointed. Food was superb too. We couldn't be any closer to the check in as we walked from the plane to the hotel. Couldn't hear any outside noise from our room. We will definitely be back.

Beautiful, comfy and convenient stay at this hotel. Breakfast was lovely and staff very friendly. Would definitely recommend. Excellent value for money Joshua was particularly helpful during our stay.

This is an in-airport hotel where you can actually forget that you are at the airport. It's a little oasis.

Whether you're coming in late, and want to rest before starting your trip around the island, or having an early morning flight, this is the place to stay. During our last trip, we stayed here twice for the mentioned szenarios. This place has everything you need and more! The staff is very welcoming, highly trained, and efficient, making any interaction pleasant, smooth and swift. The rooms are very clean, well equipped, and spacious. As a diamond member, I was happy to be upgraded and enjoy the benefits their suite had to offer. The room was incredible in size, and the welcoming offerings were too kind. The breakfast is extensive and of good quality, something we really enjoyed before stepping on a long flight. Amazing lounge!! Warm food and the taste is good. You are welcomed by an amazing smiley face Sri Wiyan very polite and pays attention to details and anticipate customer needs. You need more people like her.

Booking up was easy and straight forward with a pre payment being taken 3 months before we got there. I generally like the pre payments as my planning very rarely sees us having to forfeit a booking. Near arrival time we messaged the hotel about the shuttle bus, this is not needed as the hotel is literally 150m outside of arrivals, well sign posted to. The hotel was very helpful even arranging us someone to wait at arrivals to escourt us to the hotel, we declined this generous offer though. Checkin was swift, helpful and informative. During checkin we were told the hotel had been overbooked so we had been upgraded to the executive room, this didn't seem much different to the superior king room we booked? This room overlooked the pool area. Room was clean, had a ipod dock, TV, coffee machine, fridge and toiletries for you to use. The bed was very comfortable, firm but comfortable. There are plenty of things to do at this hotel, my girlfriend made use of the gym early morning which has running machine, bicycle and free weights. Breakfast charge was 140,000IDR and had a good variety of foods and drinks including breads, pastries, rice dishes, Indonesian dishes, sushi, fresh fruits, yoghurts, egg station and cereals so you should find something you like. After we were told the hotel was overbooked we explained that we would be checking out at 10:30 which is earlier than the 12:00 check out time. In the morning we had been kicked off the internet system so had to call reception and get us reinstalled. Then at 08:00 and again at 08:45 we had room service come and ask to clean the room, these occurrences felt like we were being politely asked to leave early, to which we didn't and left at 10:30 as explained the day before. If the hotel has been over booked then kicking a customer off the WiFi system and having room service try to rush a customer out of their rooms will only give a customer ammunition to give a low score, Luckily we are not rushed and will go when we want before a checkout time as we are paying guests and expect the service offered. A nice place to stay with a great location for transit flight waits but dont let them rush you when they make problems for themselves by overbooking rooms!!

An amazing oasis in the hub of the airport. My husband and I landed at 11pm and within half an from exiting the plane were in the comfort of our room. No stress after 20 odd hours of travelling- gold!!! The buffet breakfast was plentiful and definitely value for money. The pool area is beautiful and relaxing.

Not bad. The worst part was trying to find how to walk to the hotel. As you are exiting the airport, turn left before walking past the large, ornate gate-like entrances. If you look to your left, you will see a sign that says Airport Hotel. Follow that through a parking garage and up a ramp. Another minor bad thing is the showers. There is no door, so you need to be careful that you don't get water splashing out of the bathroom area onto the carpet. It's doable, just an annoying design to me :). Beds are firm, but with padding on top. Also, the rooms are sound proof - you won't hear the planes, traffic, or hotel neighbors! Buffet breakfast is ok, plenty of options. Choose this airport as we were arriving at midnight and wanted a close and quiet hotel to quickly grab some Zzz and food before heading to our next destination.
We recently stayed on two occasions. Both times staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel's proximity to the airports is great.

Its an OK hotel for transit or cancelled flight passengers. Nicely decor with warm and friendly staffs. Being Bali, there are better hotels for a Bali holiday. Service available are adequate and slightly pricey than outside but that is normal for all hotels. Room were clean and quiet on the ground floor although don‚Äôt know about the upper floor since this hotel is a stone throw from the airport.

Fantastic hotel, and refreshingly good service, when asking what options were vegan at breakfast, the manager offered to have 2 vegan dishes made up which were wonderful. Tantri looked after us at our table. Great hospitality!
A very good stay in this hotel. We like going at this hotel especially when we need to be next to the airport. The rooms are clean, the service is great. Thank you üôè

Stayed for one night due to late arrival into Bali. Awesome hotel, very nice and clean, great amenities. On our departure we wanted to book a day room as our flight is leaving late, they were fully booked. We were still treated like guests, offered to store our luggage, use of spa facilities and wifi. Great customer experience and lovely helpful staff
nice to walk right from hotel into airport

If you're arriving/leaving late to/from Bali or need a hotel close to the airport, then this is a great choice. We had the good fortune to stay there when the traffic stopped outside the airport and people jumped out of cars to walk to the airport on 29/12/23. You can get a late 6pm checkout which really helps for those late flights out of Bali. The included buffet breakfast is very good with lots of options. The oxtail nasi goreng we had for dinner was the best nasi goreng we had while we were in Indonesia. It's not a luxury hotel but well positioned for what it is and is walking distance from both international and domestic airports... Less than 5 minutes. And best of all we did not hear one plane in either of our stays there. And like most hotels in Indonesia, the staff and their service was excellent.

Best thing about this hotel that there is a shortcut straight into the check-in area. No need to wait in long security lines! Good for overnight layovers and I believe you can book a 6 hour stay in a room. Perfect if you're looking for a shower and a nap. Staff and service are amazing.

Inside airport, but I really wish there are more signs on how to get there. It was okay for staying short term, but if you looking for longer stay, different location closer to your destination is better. The room is nicely furnished but little short for amenities. They are available but only upon request. In room dining is good, the prices are rather steep for simple menu. However, the taste is good.

THE BAD: 1) This place smells like sewer, as the night progressed it got even worse. Very much unbearable. We spent one night & that was too much. The hotel is not even okay to serve as an overnight before the flight mainly because that smell is awful & sickening. 2) They do not inform u of shuttle service so we ordered a taxi to then find some people scheduling a hotel shuttle. 3) They only gave us 2 bottles of water. 4) Carpeted down the halls which makes it difficult to pull luggage. THE GOOD: the room is a cute futuristic modern style. Compact but functional.
A five star hotel indeed. Services are top-tier. Luxury atmosphere, nice and clean room. A lot of facilities available as well. Dont have any doubt to revisit again next time! Thank you üèîÔ∏è

Kamarnya bersih serta nyaman buat istirahat setelah aktivitas. Ada banyak fasilitas hotel yang bisa digunakan. Pelayanan sangat ramah dan cepat tanggap. Lokasi dekat sama bandara jadi tidak takut ketinggalan pesawat.
Nice rooms nice food, good for whom is in transit because inside at the airport. A bit uncomfortable to reach the centre city expecially during in rush hours

Very clean rooms , staff were super friendly and helpful. Primmer lounge had nice atmosphere relaxing in afternoon time and Erica ( staff in charge) was polite, approachable, professional with beautiful smile at all times.

Second time we have stayed here overnight. Both occasions, we stayed in a suite room which are big and very comfortable. The suite rooms also give access to the premium lounge. We had a good time in their cocktail hour, and were looked after really well by Sri Wiyani. Thankyou!!

The Hotel is good, the receptionist wasn‚Äôt that friendly. The breakfast is good. The room it‚Äôs ok The only things bothered me is the bathroom. The toilet bidet dirty and moldy . You need to bleach and clean the bidet water spray. Also the sink has a mold too You need to clean those bathroom real good for International standard Hotel. The hotel is convenient to go to airport check in. The best guy is the Bell Boy! There are really helping with our luggage‚Äôs. I won‚Äôt come back to this hotel , the reason is about the dirty toilet in the room. I will try Hilton Garden next time.

Very convenient 5 minute walk from airport arrivals exit. Staff will meet you and walk you back to the hotel if you ask. Very quiet considering it's right next to the airport. Didn't hear a single plane the 18 hours we were there.

This is the PERFECT hotel to spend a couple hours before your flight to shower and rest up. Booked the cheapest room with 2 single beds for a family of four adults and spent a couple hours here for that exact reason as our Qantas flight was at 10PM. Room and bathroom were clean and modern. Staff were polite and professional, rooms were clean, and the hotel is directly connected to the airport, so 5 minutes' walk from reception and you're at the airlines' check-in areas. They also provide 2 free bottles of water (Aqua brand, in glass bottles) in the room, but the Wi-Fi allows connections for up to 2 devices only.
Thanks to all the Buffet crew. You are very attentive and kind. Food was fresh, tasty. My friend and I loved the eggplant curry.

Very good hotel near the Bali/Denpasar area. You can walk (10 minutes) after customs to you‚Äôre hotel. Rooms are good and the beds are perfect after a long flight There is a front and back entrance so make sure you choose the front one if ordering a taxicab
Kamar‚Äônya bagus, pelayanannya memuaskan, menu brekfastnya bervariasi. Sangat cocok untuk transit karena berada didalam AirPort. Cuma 1 menit ke check in international
The service was excellent. Noise levels were low inside the room. Breakfast was very good, but the dinner in their restaurant was only average.
very nice location and kind staff members

I enjoyed my stay. I visited the Premier Lounge and was very impressed with Sri Wiyani who was the hostess in the lounge on my visit. She was very professional, attentive and personable and gave exceptional customer service. All the staff I met were approachable and friendly.

Had amazing experienced staying with Novotel airport hotel . I had 10 hours lay over in bali and decided to stay in the hotel instead waiting along at the airport for my next flight . Being 7 months pregnant and with 1 9yo it‚Äôs not easy to push trolley to the hotel but Novotel assisted me with someone pick us up on the arrival and let me checked in early too and I had a really good rest and shower . Staffs was friendly and helpful . So greatful and thanks full . Definitely will stay again .thank you

Location is an absolute winner. This is a walking distance to both domestic and international terminals and therefore it is an absolute winner for an overnight stay if you are transiting between flights. It is a little bit more expensive then other hotels nearby but you wont need to worry about transport and costs associated with it. Additionally, it is clean, with lots of rooms and breakfast was good. I have nothing bad to say. This is what an airport hotel should be.

Really disappointed won‚Äôt stay again. I had to change the booking due to flight time arrival so I emailed them and got a prompt response reassuring me that it would be adjusted. This was a few weeks prior to arrival. On the night of arrival at 1am massive wait time to check in. Waited close to 1 hour. Then when I was seen I was told the booking was not adjusted. I showed them the email from their hotel response and receptionist did not help but just said apologised and said nothing they could do and they were booked out. I had share a single bed with a family member because I had no other option. We had a number of suitcases, no one helped us to carry them to the room. Wouldn‚Äôt bother again due to this experience.

Was a nice airport hotel to stay the night after a long day flying. Breakfast was awesome and really had a variety of food which was great. Only issue we had was when we got to the room the access card did not work. That was fixed quickly with a passaby staff who got a new one. Comfy room would stay again.
Did not stay here but was told by a friend that it was nice

From the time that we check in the hotel, warm welcome from the FO staff. Specifically Eva Melita with the way she solve our problems. Stay calm and looking away to solve my booking mistake. Very impressive. I would like to mention Sari Fitri from the restaurant, we love her knowledge of the menu and so patiently helping us with the choice of the menu, beside that she answered all of the information that we want to know about general info of the airport. And off course the rest of the staff is very helpful and we love their welcome smail for us.
Many thanks for kindness of Ms. SRI WIYANI

Very good service and staff. Rooms were good, although the exhaust fans in the bathroom were not functioning, and the drains for the sink were a bit slow, but the staff fixed it up quickly. Overall, very good service and quality.
Good service and kind. Thanks Candra for everything.

Clean rooms, comfortable bed , great breakfast. The pricing is good as well , the hotel has direct access to international terminal, checkin and checkout was fast. The sound insulation for rooms is bad. Since the hotel is bang next to airport runway the insulation isn't great , we had constant disturbance from the airplanes taking off and landing. I have stayed at many airport hotels but never faced this issue.

Sri wiyani and mega was wonderful in the lounge they made me feel like a king. Great job the lounge is now so much better than before. Check inn great but room stunk of mould allergy problem i lovve this hotel its always great to start a holiday here.
The hotel was close to the airport and my wife and I enjoyed the hotel! And special thanks to Kevin who can speak Korean! He was very kind and nice.
Service is good, I recommend. Thank you Candra

The hotel is impressive in design, service, and its outstanding sound proofing of the room, considered it is facing the runway. Only a very minimal amount of engine hum came through, but not enough to disturb one's sleep. I find the front staffs welcoming and warm. The price of this hotel is way cheaper than the novotel at Bangkok airport (expensive and outdated). There's a fair amount of walking if you are loaded with luggage. I took the offer of a driver (upstairs departure level) for 50,000 IDR, a small price to pay on such a hot humid day, turned out he had a lovely 7 seater! Overall, I'm very satisfied with this hotel right next to the airport. A good choice to consider if you are on transit and has a very early flight to catch the next day.

A conveniently located (a short stroll) from Denpasar (Bali) Airport. Staff were very welcoming and friendly. Check in and check out was smooth. Rooms were clean and food (both breakfast and room service) were first class and great value. There is a pool to have a bit of a swim. A must do is visit the spa and have a 2 hour massage here. I felt so relaxed and strolled to my flight which was nearby. Will definitely be coming back soon :)

I was arrived early and friendly staff help me to check in and gave me useful information. Clean room but we didn't get real king size bed it was two single bed put together. overall was a great stay and nice swimming pool. I like the breakfast buffet too. thanks for nice service.

nice room set up. quiet, perfect for good rest before morning flight. i've stayed here several times and had a bit of trouble during my most recent stay. i wasn't able to sleep in my room (2358), so at 3am decided to go outside and sit on a blue sofa near the resto. was just on short pant and t shirt. after a while, i started to feel itchy on my leg and arm. i was bitten by bed bugs and started to see bumps on my skin. can still feel the itch until now though. the cleaner must do the job properly, as many other guest wearing shorts & shirt may be affected with same bed bugs issue.

Baru pertama kali ke Bali dan memilih Novotel sebagai tempat kami menginap. Selain lokasi yang dekat dengan airport, Novotel memiliki fasilitas yang lengkap ditambah layanan hotel yang maksimal membuat kami betah dan nyaman untuk menginap di hotel ini. Hotel ini sangat saya rekomendasikan untuk kalian yang sedang berlibur ke Bali~

Pernah nginep disini karna ada tamu yg ngajakin pas dia singgah di bali 4 hari, sumpah pelayanannya bagus banget, cepet tanggap staffnya, makanannya juga enak semua. Deket juga kalo mau ke pantai dan tempat hiburan di kuta. Ga kebayang ada pelayanan sebagus ini di deket bandara yg biasanya cuma ada di pinggir pantai nusa dua. Semoga kedepannya bisa staycation disini bareng keluarga. Super recommend üëçüëç
Sangat efisien di dalam bandara.

The service was great! If you‚Äôre after a resort this is the wrong place. But if you‚Äôre after a clean spacious room at the airport, with great service from generous staff, and a solid buffet breakfast, this is perfect.

Great hotel to stay at to take the stress out of getting to the airport. You just walk straight from the hotel to checkin. Will definately stay here again. Hopefully they have made the Rooftop bar a lot more inviting.

Rooms are good, bit pricy, but worth it. Serves early breakfast from 03:30 am on. Big plus: direct access to international departure hall, so no hassle dragging your lugage through the sweltering heat (airport AC is non-existent) and can use your trolley (normally only allowed on 1st floor, after that carry yourself).

Fantastic transit hotel , stayed here for 1 nite as i had a early morning flight. Rooms are very comfortable , as were the beds with many pillows and a spacious bathroom with a very large shower. Breakfast is served from 6.30am and it was great to check out of the hotel and walk straight into the airport itself . I walked into my check in counter which was 50m from tbe hotel exit....magic.

Checking in was amazing, Windy and Chandra had EVERYTHING set up perfectly. Sri wiyana‚Äôs service in the VIP lounge was top notch. Breakfast was delicious and Erika was an amazing help before our flight.

Speechless! Who would have thought an airport hotel could turn into a vacation home stay. And that's exactly what my friends and I on a Bali Gurls Trip turned into. Quiet, clean, aesthetically beautiful, the food is great....and the hotel staff....hands down very welcoming and exceptionally accommodating (side note: we had a horrible experience with arrangements with another 'host' place to stay). The warmest and kindest people I've ever met. Novotel Airport was definitely home for us and I'm quote sure we were adopted as Family. üôè Matur Suksma to the wonderful staff at Novotel/Accor Hotels! I enjoyed every moment of my stay here.

Very convenient hotel for late arrivals in Bali, as it is located in the airport and connected with the International Departure terminal. The room was great - thank you for upgrading me to the Suite room! However, the quality of the food at the restaurant could have been better. The buffet spread (the varieties) is fine, but the taste needs improvement, especially the Indonesian items.

A very pleasant and quiet hotel to stay in right next to the airport. It has a direct walk link into the airport itself - very handy. I don't really understand why I cannot collect Accor points for food and services purchased at the hotel. Even though I booked through a third party site (and wouldn't earn credit for the room), surely everything else I spend should get points, or do I take my loyalty out the front door to eat and have spa treatments?
Great place to stay. Short walk to the airport. We made use of the gym, pool and buffet breakfast was delicious. Try the traditional foods leave the eggs on toast for when you go home

It's located in the airport, no need to go outside to access this hotel. Check-in is fast, room was clean. I haven't tried the pool but no one was there at that time. Breakfast was 5* , really! If you need to go straight to the departure terminal after the check-out, they have a VIP access which leads you directly to the security and the boarding gates, very convenient !

Great hotel Great for stopover if you have late flight or early morning flight Food was great nice breakfast Room service was a little cold Very friendly staff as standard of Novotel in Bali Nice comfortable room and nice view of the planes landing Pool was a nice escape. Little plane noise but very secluded and takes you away from being at the airport. Great gym facilities everything you need and can bluetooth your own music to the sounds right (with great sound)

Pelayanan saat check in baik, ramah dan helpful. Kamar tidur bersih dan rapi. Lokasi sangat stategis utk transit di bandara Bali. Menu sarapan hotel juga variatif dan taste good. In general, Novotel Bali Ngurah Rai sangat Recommended to stay. Mantap dan sukses buat Novotel Bali Ngurah Rai. Terima kasih.

One night stay in an Executive Room with Premier Lounge access. Sri Wiyani in the Premier Lounge provided exceptional hospitality, looking after us exceptionally well and delivering true Balinese service with warmth and grace. Great service and thanks for making our day and making our stay.
Perfect airport hotel. As a frequent traveller and Accor Plus member, I couldn‚Äôt have been more impressed with the suite, executive lounge and roof top bar. Thank you, Novotel.

The room is clean and staff is friendly. They have warm to hot rooms with low water pressure and not very comfortable. It is not worth the money to be close to the airport, much better places like the backpackers. The food was buffet style so it was cold and with little flavor. This hotel likes to steal your money. booked a room and then extended because of a late flight. Then Jetstar couldn‚Äôt get the flight loaded before the airport closed for the night so flight was canceled. They put into this hotel should have let them put us in IBIS. This hotel will not refund the half day I paid when jetstar paid them for a night. The way I see it they got paid 150% for the room and they are ok with it
Great hotel with airport view

Clean, comfortable and convenient. I booked in for my final few hours in Bali, so I had somewhere to relax and shower before an overnight flight. The flight ended up cancelled. The staff let me book an extra night, and then cancel my extra night booking for no charge when I found out my new flight details. The breakfast buffet is amazing - a huge spread of western and Asian choices. I'll stay here again if I'm flying in or out of Bali late at night.

i was shocked by the generosity of the room size as an airport hotel. it is even bigger than the shangrila hotel room in the Sydney CBD! very convient location, decent decoration, kind staff and fair price. the acoustic treatment is perfect that you can not hear the noise from airporr at all. 5 star!

Room is good. Small, but all are okay. Soundproof also. Staffs are understaffed, seems like they have not added back staff post covid pandemic. Access from domestic terminal will be tough when you carry luggages, as there are no hotel staff helping you. And the lobby is upstairs, with only escalators to go up. (So image you carry big luggage upstairs using escalator, with no aircon.)

Wish I could have stayed more! Arrived late at night so I booked an overnight room at Novotel. The staff were great and super friendly. The room was even better. I was at the executive king room which had every basic things you need and some extra stuff like a sewing kit, shoe shine kit and even a vanity kit! The breakfast buffet was great, with lots of options to choose from. The only negative thing for me about this hotel is how there's very few signages and the walk way wasnt well lit. Overall great experience.

I think fresh has good food for breakfast selection. If you like to splurge on every pennies worth always stop by a nearby mall to grab some snacks in buckets....which i regret not doing but il do that next time.

If you want a hotel close to the airport in Bali then this is the place. Right on the airstrip between the international and domestic airports. Perfect for our 1 night stopover from Australia before flying to lombok for the moto gp. The entrance is pretty hard to find and is not that well sign posted. I think the best way is take the elevator from arrivals on ground floor to departures and there is a bridge across to the novotel. Being so close to the runway we expected a bit of noise but it was surprisingly quiet. Bars and food were decent for fair prices. Rooms were fine prob 4 star, a bit dated for 5 star.

Ideal setting to stay when arriving in Bali. Super comfy beds, high quality cots, great breakfast, beautiful pool. Lovely staff especially Sari at the breakfast As close to a resort as it gets in an airport.

3 to 5 minute walk from international arrivals,can recommend for those late arrival or early departure flights, felt so refreshed in the morning. Great pool,food and staff couldn't be more helpful or pleasant.
Excellent location if you have a flight that arrives late at night or leaves early in the morning. Room was clean and tidy. Breakfast was a bit average but reasonably priced.

Terima kasih Novotel Bali Airport Bali, Jujur saya org asli Bali dan penyuka kuliner...makanan d sana sangat beraneka ragam dan banyak pilihan, mantab.. rasanya cocok ke masing2 rasa pengunjung khususnya local dg harga yg sangat kompetive.. staffnya ok. Utk kamar Krn saya hny stay sehari saja Krn langsung terbang lagi, kamarnya bersih dan nyaman. Fo, ramah pelayanannya dan lengkap dg welcome drink 2pilihan mineral infuse dan juice..cocok utk pengunjung. Sekali lagi terima kasih banyak semuanya Ats pelayanan yg memuaskan.

Room is very cozy, bathroom and bedroom are so clean. And receptionist at the front desk was really friendly and nice. I absolutely recommend this hotel to others. Due to the pandemic, I had simple breakfast in the morning, but it was pretty good.

Convenient, close access to the airport. Comfortable, clean, quiet rooms with wifi, USB charging points, room service, and air conditioning. Friendly and accommodating staff. The in-house day spa is wonderful, and the restaurant comfortable with a good menu. Popular with airlines for flight crew accommodation.
The premium lounge was great. Every staff was very kind and friendly, especially Sri Wiyani üëç, her smile made us happy. The food and the drinks were yummy, tooüòãüòä

Pilihan yang tepat untuk menginap karena lokasinya yang dekat dengan Bandara Internasional Ngurah Rai. Kamar tidur nya modern selain itu fasilitasnya juga lengkap seperti restoran, kolam renang dan pusat kebugaran. Hotel ini juga menyediakan layanan antar jemput Bandara. pelayanannya juga ramah
good place to stay maximum one night

Salah satu tempat menginap recomnded yang dekat dengan Bandara Ngrah Rai Bali...pelayanan di sini cukup baik..fasilitas hotel juga lengkap dan menu sarapan yang bervariatif...cocok utk tempat liburan dan menginap keluarga

Sebagai hotel transit karena baru penerbangan dari Melbourne. Ini bisa jadi pilihan yang tepat. Fasilitas kamar lengkap. Breakfast yang juga beragam variasi. Staf yang ramah dibantu mbak Chandra Dwi. Semoga selalu memberikan pelayanan yg terbaik Novotel Bali Ngurah Rai Airport.

Booked a short stay before pm flight, toilet roll was saturated??? And service at bar and restaurant was so slow, had to get my own drinks from the bar as they took20mins+ to make and then just sat there getting warm, pretty much got ignored, went back to bar 3 hrs later to get a soft drink, 3 people behind bar, no one was interested in helping so we left, very disappointed with our experience

The closest hotel to the airport probably. The hotel staff is extremely nice. Food is great actually, you should definitely try their sauces. And the hotels swimming pool is really comforting and they have little hamacs. You can walk to the nearest beach which is Kuta or Jerman. But everything else is too far :').
Easy walking distance from the airport for a late night arrival. Friendly, welcoming service. Fantastic selection for breakfast, recommend the freshly cooked omelets.
Staff are very nice and accommodating

Convenient for an overnight stay if you are arriving late. The rooms are pretty standard. Breakfast good. Thankyou to the front reception gentleman who went out of his way to locate a missing item I went to collect on 10 October. Exceptional service. I really appreciated it.

Easy access from the Bali airport and it is modern but still elegant and exotic. I liked friendly staff and the kids area in the lobby. Something to improve may be the food I had in the Square restaurant. It wasn't the best. And I could hear foot steps from upstiars while sleeping.
Staff are friendly The lunch was excellent
The place is comfy and provide affordable price in Bali. It is recommends to stay there as it is closed to the airport for finding some supplies and needs when staying at the hotel.

One of the best airport I‚Äôve ever been to at a very reasonable price. Great amenities and facilities. Only downside is that the linen smells of cigarette. Would definitely return. Don‚Äôt make the same mistake as I did, hotel is accessible from the inside. Follow the Airport Hotel sign.

Really a good idea to stay one night here before flying home especially when we took a long day to return from the Gili islands. Right next to the airport departure hall makes life easy and comfortable before long flight. Rooftop bar allows you to spend time having a drink while watching the planes take off and landed. Reasonable price for the quality of the rooms and hotel. Enjoy it.

rather difficult to find if u came from international arrivals, lack of signage to find this hotel, i had to push my trolley on the road just to get to main entrance which is unsealed pavements, not recommended to push your trolley on it or if u came in on a wheelchair. no help at all from their staff. also no lift to get to the mezzanine that leads to the lobby (thru a lift, what teh heck). so i had to use the ramp to get there, with of course, no help from their staff. food was okay i suppose if u just stick to the western breakfast. but the indonesian cuisine there were seriously bland, i guess its to cater more for foreigners. other than its a good place to rejuvenate before your next flight. its appropriately priced (except for the food, better go to nearby solaria to get tastier and good priced meal)

Terimakasih, gluten free bread nya enak, Breakfastnya enak, makanan dan dessertnya bermacam macam, pelayanan staff nya juga ramah, resto yang luas, kamar yang nyaman. Pokoknya rekomendasi kalau mampir ke airport wajib menginap disini
Kamarnya bagus, cukup luas dan nyaman. Makanannya juga enak-enak. Cocok untuk yang mau stay cation atau liburan bareng teman atau keluarga.

I checked in late at night and the close distance from the airport gave me a comfort and relaxation. Room was clean and big enough for two people. There is another hotel near the airport that gives pick-up and drop-off service for free. If I had known this back then, I would have been there :)
Great hotel and good breakfast
This is my first time to Novotel Airport. Friendly staff and excellent service. Many variations of food and strategic hotels. Keep up the good work Joshua, thank you f&b team.

Salah satu hotel berbintang 4 di dalam Airport Bali mulai harga 1.1jutaan dan mempunyai fasilitas akses langsung ke Bandara Internasional Ngurah Rai. Selain itu, hotel ini juga cocok buat para tamu yang lagi transit, tiba di malam /subuh hari atau keberangkatan di subuh hari . Di sini juga banyak fasilitas terutama taman terbuka bisa santai-santai (seperti di foto ini), kolam renang, SPA, Fitness center sampai ada Rooftop bar ü§©üëç

Very convenient for early morning domestic connections after a long day of international travel. Aldo at the front desk was very kind and helpful in our sleep-deprived state. we were also able to store bags down at the desk instead of hauling them to our room and back just a few hours later. the cost is a little more than one can find for another airport but for convenience it cannot be beaten. It is just a bit of a walk from international terminal if you have a lot of baggage.
Lokasi hotel pas di dalam bandara.super aman dengan pengamanan bandara.

Had to move rooms twice because the first two had a smell of wet/mould. Dinner & lunch were bainmarie service of ok food in a city where you can get the best meal you've ever had for $10. For a hotel that is advertised at $150 aud a night, I think they need to severely up their game. Staff are all friendly and helpful, but I believe management are just in it for the fat gains had by cheap labour workforce and easy access to customers from the airport.

Hotel staff are super friendly and welcoming. I noticed a kids play area where they sit and play games;video games not seen that anywhere which is super cool . Rooms are clean and comfortable ,bathroom surfaces like bathroom floor and sink need to be given an extra clean.

I am back here after Covid-19. Novotel always a good choice. Rooms are clean, staff are good welcoming and friendly. The spa is excellent experience, I literally slept on the table. I must thank Joshua for his service and patience. Thank you Novotel

Yak ampun kapan lagi rasanya nginap di hotel Novotel rasanya ngak mau pulang pelayanannya bagus fasilitasnya lengkap tempatnya tersusung tapi dekat bandara lagi bahkan makananya ataupun minumanya nya begitu lengkap mau piknes juga ada baru kali ini saya nemukan hotel yg seperti ini pokoknya thebest mudah mudahan liburan tahun depan bisa kesini lagi...

It's a good place to be.Food is ok. They don't have much choice in the in room dining menu. The buffet doesn't offer any variety like you'd expect. Good for a night stay if you don't have other option. The staff are friendly and attentive and courteous.

Beautiful hotel, for a nice and quiet stay. Great facilities. Amazing staff, friendly and considerate. Waiter Nova while i ordered room service noticed that i was getting a flu and she took the initiative to go all the way back and bring warm water, ginger and honey for me. Thank you!
